title: Define project requirements and specifications
description: Outline the functional and non-functional requirements for the assistantNeurofeedback project.

title: Design the user interface and user experience
description: Create wireframes, mockups, and prototypes for the assistantNeurofeedback device.

title: Develop the real-time neuro feedback system
description: Create the algorithms and systems necessary to capture, analyze, and interpret neural signals in real-time.

title: Integrate the real-time neuro feedback system with the UI/UX design
description: Combine the real-time neuro feedback system with the user interface and user experience design.
dependencies: Design the user interface and user experience
Develop the real-time neuro feedback system

title: Test and validate the assistantNeurofeedback device
description: Conduct rigorous testing and validation of the assistantNeurofeedback device to ensure it meets the defined requirements.
dependencies: Integrate the real-time neuro feedback system with the UI/UX design

title: Document the assistantNeurofeedback device design and functionality
description: Write technical documentation detailing the design, functionality, and usage of the assistantNeurofeedback device.
dependencies: Test and validate the assistantNeurofeedback device
